title: Low Priority Queues
body:
Hey OCE,

On the 24th December 2014 approximately 10:45 I started a ranked game with my duo partner but soon into this game because of family reasons I was forced to leave. At the time I was fully aware of my penalties. Later that night when I returned home I logged back in to be notified that my account will be penalised with a Low Priority Queue. This is fine. I understand it. 

I talked to some North American friends on Reddit who say their queue times are around 5-10 minutes. Well  yesterday at around 2:15 pm ACST I joined ranked queue.  I still have not found a queue of any sort. I understand this is low priority queue but this is insane. I understand I have done wrong. I deserve a punishment but this is not a punishment. This is just downright stupid. Please in the light of the seven, suspend my account for a time-being so I can at least accept my punishment and move on with my life rather than waiting around for a queue to pop.... 

**Is there an expiry date to Low Priority Queues? **

All i want for Christmas is my league account back

replies.body: doesnt the timer count down? my friends all had 5 minute ones that counted down...if you cancel the queue it resets tho...
No my counter keeps going down to 30:00 and reseting. I think its a bug. it has to be. This is frustrating man.
That's a known bug with low priority queues, you should contact support about it.
I did. The support staff are really really bad. Most of them are probably out for holiday. Haven't played league in like a whole day man! Whole %%%%ing day!

Yeh, it does suck that you got this bug. If I were you I'd find another game to play for a while, I don't see it getting fixed anytime soon (they've been working on it for a while if I'm not mistaken).
Are you serious man? Damn I really wanted to play a %%%%load these holidays. I can't really play any other games. Sucks having a Macbook ..... SIgh %%%% me.

Then you probably have had these before and it's doing it worse.

It won't have a date, it's a number of games.
First time. This system is just so buggy. Its horrible. I would love you know 30 mins queue timers not this bull%%%%.
hey riot games my username is TAPURSISTER and im getting queues from leaving games but my league always stops working but can u please take off these queues off my account please
